# Introduction

This folder contains source code from third parties that are used for the plugins.

## trivy

The files here were copied from https://github.com/aquasecurity/trivy/blob/main/cmd/trivy/main.go. Exact changes made are discussed [here](./trivy/README.md).

## sourcekitten

Sourcekitten binaries are built from this [repo](https://github.com/jpsim/SourceKitten).
